Tucson steps up to view the computer screen.  He casts a finger to try to c=
onnect the points of all of those abducted.  He looks to Leo at the same ti=
me.

" Yes, that's right, there was definitely high concentrations of Unicr=
onian energy being used at that point of time.   Every being casts their ow=
n energy frequency whether it be low, medium or high, depending on that Ind=
ividuals strength profile.  Now, if those signatures are the same coming fr=
om those various locations, it would indicate that the same individual is r=
esponsible for those abductions.  Leo, can you bring that data up for me by=
 chance?"

The strategist part of Tucson comes back to life as he begins to=
 piece things together as he did on Cybertron, years ago.

" This definitel=
y takes me back In time when I was going over this with the senior officers=
 vorns ago.  I actually enjoyed this aspect of military duty, it was a good=
 challenge for a rookie in training.  And the strange aspect of that was th=
e fact I just simply had a knack for solving complex strategies."

He then =
thinks of Optimus Primal, and how they could determine his last location.

=
" Mathematics, it has everything to do with numbers.  The geographic coordi=
nates, they lead to areas of latitude and longitude.  Now, to find Primal, =
he must have informed someone as to where he was going.  We chart the dista=
nce between here and the intended destination, and map out various routes l=
eading to that location.  You will come up with several different scenarios=
 but, they will all point to one area of bilocation.  We then factor in his=
 rate of speed he was traveling at, including the time he left here, and th=
e time it takes to reach the final destination.  Then, determine the time o=
f his last transmission and that will indicate how far he got and where he =
could possibly be now.  I know it sounds complicated, but it worked on Cybe=
rtron, so let's see if that will work here."

Perpetually on the move and c=
onstantly busy. 

On Aug 24, 2011, at 12:05 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclon=
us@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>

> > Tucson had seen complex strategies =
before and this one was definitely trying
> > everyone's logic circuits. Mi=
litary strategy was one of his areas of
> > expertise and it was a good opp=
ortunity to exercise his skills as a
> > strategist.
> >
> > " before I evo=
lved into a Prime, I spent quite a few vorns assisting the
> > Autobots in =
the military strategy department. And this one here, is very
> > much like =
something I've seen before. Not by Unicronians but by the
> > Decepticons b=
ack in the days of the wars on Iacon. I was only a rookie at
> > the time b=
ut I've always had a knack in this field of study so the officers
> > gave =
me a chance to attempt to crack a very complex case. It had to do with
> > =
how they were causing Autobots to vanish on the battlefield. As everything
=
> > is now it was back then. They vanished in various quadrants and when I =
used
> > a holographic map and drew lines that connected those locations, i=
t came up
> > with an epicenter of activity around the drawn lines. I told =
the officers I
> > wasn't a hundred percent sure but it was possible that t=
he location was the
> > area we were looking for. They investigated and the=
y found the missing
> > Autobots housed in an abandoned complex on Cybertro=
n. It was one of
> > Shockwave's master plans that were intended to remain =
a mystery but he did
> > not count on a not so average Autobot to figure it=
 out. I was always
> > considered to be a bit strange, and off the beaten p=
ath. But the council
> > kept me on their team all the same. They said due =
to my rebel like nature,
> > that I would not be chosen as a commander but =
my skills were a great asset
> > to them. I was content with their decision=
 all the same. I was comfortable
> > just being who I was. So if I'm not a =
good fit as a Prime, I respect their
> > decision. "
> >
> > He returns to =
robot mode. He looks to Leo Prime with a strategists
> > expression.
> >
> =
> " I may be wrong about my theory but I'm curious to see if this case is
>=
 > similar to the one I decoded back on Cybertron. And if it is, we could
>=
 > even locate the purpetrator as well."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> There was an answe=
ring nod from LEO PRIME. "Of course and I have seen
> the recordings of tha=
t stratagy. What Shockwave was doing could be
> called a feint. He gave you=
 something to be figured out, and yet it
> was destract you from his more i=
mportant goal."
> LEO FROWNED, "Something that may be happening here." He l=
ooked at
> TUSCON as he spoke, "But from what Wing Caliber tells me though =
is
> that it did save them a lot of time which was useful in defeating
> SH=
ockwave."
> 
> The screen changed as LEO entered the parameters that were k=
nown. The
> approximate place where CHEETOR was last seen as well as CYCLON=
US and
> RODIMUS. "Interesting." LEO said. "It does seem that these soldier=
s
> were all captured in a similar location, within perhaps several
> hundr=
ed miles from each other."
> 
> Plugging the information on the screen the =
picture of that same jungle
> appeared again. "It would seem that this same=
 location is still being
> pointed to." There was a slight shrug, "But with=
out knowing where
> Primal was when he was taken it is hard to hazzard a gu=
ess."
> 
> LEO looked up at TUSCON, "Didn't the last report about Cheetor's=

> captors say that they were Minion or at least the readings showed
> mini=
on energy in use?" He nodded as he stroked his chin thoughtfully.
> 
> (TAG=
)
> 
> Preston

LEO FROWNED, "Something that may be happening =

ls me though is<br>
that it did save them a lot of time which was useful in=
 defeating<br>
SHockwave."<br>

approximate place where CHEETOR was last=

were all captured in a similar location, wit=
hin perhaps several<br>
hundred miles from each other."<br>

Plugging t=
he information on the screen the picture of that same jungle<br>
appeared a=
gain. "It would seem that this same location is still being<br>
pointed to.=

he was taken it is hard to hazzard a guess."<br>

minion energy in use?" He nodded=
 as he stroked his chin thoughtfully.<br>
